attributes.action: Implement a license to practice for Medics and Non Medics in Aesthetics
attributes.additional_details:
The aesthetics industry is worth over 53 Billion and the market is expected to rise significantly. Over recent years, the amount of rogue practitioners has increased leading to botched and dangerous treatments been performed by both Medics and Non Medics in the industry. As a team of non medic/Medic Practitioners, we are passionate about making the industry safe and to prevent/ and put an end to unsafe practice. 
We want you to enforce Safe Face’s standards: monitor, inspect and protect.
attributes.background: Implement a License to Practice to Practitioners in the Aesthetics Industry. This is to provide safe and high quality care. Numerous inspections/ checks will be done within the registration process to ensure they are complying, through monitoring, inspections and rating the business.
